alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gulf; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 8:42AM EST until January 25 at 9:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 945 AM EST/845 AM CST/. * At 841 AM EST/741 AM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Wewahitchka to 7 miles south of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Royal Bluff, St George Island St Pk, Cape San Blas, Beverly, Poplar Camp, Simmons Bayou, Curtis Mill, Dalkeith, Saint Joe Beach, Fort Gadsden, Nine Mile, High Bluff and St Joseph State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST/1000 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST/1000 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.
